Discipline name (FNMOC id) {GRIB2 id}
GRIB2 IdCategory NameDescriptionFNMOC Status1WMO Status2
Meteorological products (MET) {0}
 
0 Temperature Includes temperature, dew point, lapse rate, potential temperatures, etc currentoperational
1 Moisture Includes humidities, mixing ratio, vapor pressure, precipitation, etc currentoperational
2 Momentum Includes wind speed and direction, stream functions, momentum flux, vorticity, divergence, etc currentoperational
3 Mass Includes pressure, geopotential, altitudes, density, heights, etc currentoperational
4 Short wave radiation Includes short wave radiation, brightness temperature, radiance, etc currentoperational
5 Long wave radiation Includes infrared fluxes. currentoperational
6 Cloud Includes cloud cover, cloud base, cloud top, ceiling, etc. currentoperational
7 Thermodynamic Stability Indices Includes lifted indices, K index, inhibition, helicity, etc. currentoperational
8 Kinematic Stability Indices  currentoperational
9 Temperature Probabilities  deprecateddeprecated
10 Moisture Probabilities Includes ice and precipation probabilities. deprecateddeprecated
11 Momentum Probabilities Includes wind frequencies etc. deprecateddeprecated
12 Mass Probabilities  deprecateddeprecated
13 Aerosols Includes concentration, source, slant path, type, etc. currentoperational
14 Trace gases Includes Ozone and CO2. currentoperational
15 Radar Includes spectrum width, reflectivity, precipation, etc. currentoperational
16 Forecast radar imagery Includes reflectivity factors, reflectivity, echo top, etc. currentoperational
17 Electrodynamics  currentoperational
18 Nuclear/radiology Includes concentrations, ground depositions, etc. currentoperational
19 Physical atmospheric properties Includes visibility, albedo, mixed layer depth, icing, turbulence, etc. currentoperational
20 Atmospheric chemical constituents Includes asymmetry, extinction, mass density, mass fluxes, mixing ratios, scattering, etc. currentoperational
21 Reserved values 21 to 189 Reserved for WMO use. currentoperational
190 CCITT IA5 string  currentoperational
191 Miscellaneous  currentoperational
192 Reserved values 192 to 254 Reserved for local use. currentoperational
255 Missing  currentoperational
Hydrological products (HYD) {1}
 
0 Hydrology Basic Products Includes flash flood, snow cover, etc. currentoperational
1 Hydrology Probabilities Includes precipitation fractile and probabilities, etc. currentoperational
2 Inland water and sediment properties Includes water properties, sediment properties, ice properties, shape factors, etc. currentoperational
3 Reserved values 3 to 191 Reserved for WMO use. currentoperational
192 Reserved values 192 to 254 Reserved for local use. currentoperational
255 Missing  currentoperational
Land surface products (LND) {2}
 
0 Vegetation/Biomass Includes land cover, surface roughness, etc. currentoperational
1 Agri-/aquacultural special products  currentoperational
2 Transportation-related products  currentoperational
3 Soil products Includes soil type, moisture, temperature, etc. currentoperational
4 Fire Weather Products Includes risk areas, dry lightning areas, etc. currentoperational
5 Reserved values 5 to 191 Reserved for WMO use. currentoperational
192 Reserved values 192 to 254 Reserved for local use. currentoperational
255 Missing  currentoperational
Space products (SPP) {3}
 
0 Image format products Includes scaled albedo, scaled brightness temperature, cloud mask, fire detection indicator, etc. currentoperational
1 Quantitative products Includes estimated precipitation, estimated wind u/v components, heights, quality indicators, solar zenith angle, etc. currentoperational
2 Reserved values 2 to 191 Reserved for WMO use. currentoperational
192 Reserved values 192 to 254 Reserved for local use. currentoperational
255 missing  currentoperational
Space weather products (SPC) {4}
 
0 Temperature Includes electron, proton, ion, parallel, perpendicular, etc. listedvalidation
1 Momentum Includes velocity magnitude, and three vector components, etc. listedvalidation
2 Charged particle mass and number Includes densities, absoprtion, absorption frequency, scintillation, etc. listedvalidation
3 Electric and magnetic fields Includes field magnitude, three vector field components, etc. listedvalidation
4 Energetic particles Includes fluxes for proton/electron/heavy ion/cosmic ray neutron, etc. listedvalidation
5 Waves none listedvalidation
6 Solar electomagnetic emissions Includes irradiance, x-ray flux, radio emissions, etc. listedvalidation
7 Terrestrial electomagnetic emissions Includes limb intensity, disk intensity, etc. listedvalidation
8 Imagery Includes radiances for x-ray, EUV, H-alpha, white light, CaII-K, and more; thematic mask, etc. listedvalidation
9 Ion-neutral coupling Includes conductivities of Pedersen, Hall, and Parallel; etc. listedvalidation
10 Reserved values 10 to 191 Reserved for WMO use. listedvalidation
192 Reserved values 192 to 254 Reserved for local use. listedvalidation
255 missing  listedvalidation
Reserved values 5 to 9 (5) {5}
 
Oceanographic products (OCN) {10}
 
0 Waves Includes spectra, heights, direction, primary, etc. currentoperational
1 Currents Includes direction, speed, etc. currentoperational
2 Ice Includes cover, thickness, drift, growth, divergence, etc. currentoperational
3 Surface properties Includes temperature, sea level deviation from mean, etc. currentoperational
4 Sub-surface properties Includes thermocline, salinity, etc. currentoperational
5 Reserved values 5 to 190 Reserved for use by WMO. currentoperational
191 Miscellaneous Includes stream functions currentoperational
192 Reserved 192 to 254 for Local Use Reserved for use by WMO. currentoperational
255 Missing  currentoperational
Reserved values 11 to 191 (11) {11}

Footnotes:

  1. The Status may be one of the following:
    2. valuedefinition
    availableEntry was used in the past, is not in production now, and could be used again.
    currentEntry is currently in production and available to customers.
    deprecatedEntry is no longer to be used. May or may not be in production.
    listedEntry is listed in WMO documentation. Not in production with no plans to be produced.
    obsoleteEntry is not to be used and is not in production, if it ever was.
    pendingEntry is being prepared for production.
    plannedEntry is being looked at for possible production.
  2. The WMO Status may be one of the following:
    3. valuedefinition
    deprecatedEntry is no longer used.
    experimentalEntry is not recommended for use outside of bi-lateral previously agreed tests.
    operationalEntry is available for use.
    validationEntry is in the approval process.
